com.io7m.r2.filters

Interface R2FilterFogParametersType

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    R2FilterFogParameters

    public interface R2FilterFogParametersType
    Parameters for the fog filter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.io7m.jtensors.parameterized.PVectorI3F<R2SpaceRGBType> fogColor() 
      default float fogFarPositiveZ()
      The positive eye-space Z value at which fog ends.
      default float fogNearPositiveZ()
      The positive eye-space Z value at which fog starts.
      R2Texture2DUsableType imageDepthTexture() 
      R2Texture2DUsableType imageTexture() 
      R2MatricesObserverValuesType observerValues() 
      default R2FilterFogProgression progression()
      A specification of fog progression.
      com.io7m.jareas.core.AreaInclusiveUnsignedLType viewport() 

    • Method Detail

      • progression

        default R2FilterFogProgression progression()
        A specification of fog progression. This specifies the curve that fog intensity follows at distances greater than fogNearPositiveZ().
        Returns:
        The fog progression

      • viewport

        com.io7m.jareas.core.AreaInclusiveUnsignedLType viewport()
        Returns:
        The output viewport

      • imageTexture

        R2Texture2DUsableType imageTexture()
        Returns:
        The input texture that will have fog applied

      • imageDepthTexture

        R2Texture2DUsableType imageDepthTexture()
        Returns:
        The depth texture that contains logarithmic depth values

      • fogNearPositiveZ

        default float fogNearPositiveZ()
        The positive eye-space Z value at which fog starts. Objects closer than this value have no fog applied.
        Returns:
        The starting fog distance

      • fogFarPositiveZ

        default float fogFarPositiveZ()
        The positive eye-space Z value at which fog ends. Objects further than this value are fully obscured by fog.
        Returns:
        The ending fog distance

      • fogColor

        com.io7m.jtensors.parameterized.PVectorI3F<R2SpaceRGBType> fogColor()
        Returns:
        The color of the fog

      • observerValues

        R2MatricesObserverValuesType observerValues()
        Returns:
        The observer matrix values that were used to produce the scene
